charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1101_0100:
A gust of wind touched
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s cheek as
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was walking through the forest.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1101_0200:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] headed toward where the wind
came from, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Eusine and Suicune.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_0300: I had heard about this, but I’m still surprised!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_0402_0900: I wish you could’ve seen what happened just now!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1000:
There was some murky, muddy water here just
moments ago...
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1100: But Suicune purified it in an instant!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1200:
My grandpa, who was quite into myths, always
used to tell me stories about Suicune...
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1300:
But seeing Suicune’s powers like this with my own
eyes has me all choked up!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1400:
Legend says that Suicune races around the world
to purify fouled water.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1500:
Suicune is also said to be a reincarnation of the
north wind, and—
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1600: Oh, sorry. I got a little too excited.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1700:
I was so overcome with awe that I couldn’t
contain myself!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1800:
I always dreamed of the day I’d earn
Suicune’s respect.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_1900:
The Legendary Pokémon of Ecruteak, in the
Johto region...
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_2000:
are said to come to people only when they
recognize their talents.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_2100:
In other words, it’s not the Trainer who chooses
Suicune—it’s Suicune that chooses its Trainer.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_2200:
Ever since I first heard about Suicune from
my grandpa, I’ve thought of nothing but the
moment when I would finally catch up to it.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_2300: In my mind, there was only Suicune.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_2400:
To be honest, now that I’ve caught up to Suicune,
I haven’t really thought about what to do next.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_0301_2600: So you don’t have any more goals?
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_0401_2700: Perish the thought! My determination hasn’t fizzled.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_0302_2800:
You could aim to be the number-one
sync pair!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_0402_2900:
I could, couldn’t I? Yes... This is where the real
challenge begins!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3000: My journey with Suicune has finally begun.
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3100: I have no intention of ending it here!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3200:
I will become a noble Trainer—one who does not
bring shame to his partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3300: Otherwise, I’d feel bad that Suicune chose me!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3400:
As someone who continuously chased his dream of
earning Suicune’s respect,
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3500:
I’m elated that I can now chase my other dreams
with Suicune by my side!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3600:
From now on, the two of us will strive to become
a beautiful and brave sync pair who keeps racing
towards greater heights!
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3700: Wherever it is that Suicune and I end up...
charaepi_ch0216_00_minaki/2301_1201_3800: I hope you are there to see it!
